com.google.android.exoplayer

Class MediaCodecUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer.MediaCodecUtil

  • public final class MediaCodecUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class for querying the available codecs.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MediaCodecUtil.DecoderQueryException
      Thrown when an error occurs querying the device for its underlying media capabilities.

    • Method Detail

      • getDecoderInfo

        public static DecoderInfo getDecoderInfo(java.lang.String mimeType,
                                         boolean secure)
                                  throws MediaCodecUtil.DecoderQueryException
        Get information about the decoder that will be used for a given mime type.
        Parameters:
        mimeType - The mime type.
        secure - Whether the decoder is required to support secure decryption. Always pass false unless secure decryption really is required.
        Returns:
        Information about the decoder that will be used, or null if no decoder exists.
        Throws:
        MediaCodecUtil.DecoderQueryException

      • warmCodec

        public static void warmCodec(java.lang.String mimeType,
                             boolean secure)
        Optional call to warm the codec cache for a given mime type.

        Calling this method may speed up subsequent calls to getDecoderInfo(String, boolean).

        Parameters:
        mimeType - The mime type.
        secure - Whether the decoder is required to support secure decryption. Always pass false unless secure decryption really is required.

      • getMediaCodecInfo

        public static android.util.Pair<java.lang.String,android.media.MediaCodecInfo.CodecCapabilities> getMediaCodecInfo(java.lang.String mimeType,
                                                                                                                   boolean secure)
                                                                                                            throws MediaCodecUtil.DecoderQueryException
        Returns the name of the best decoder and its capabilities for the given mimeType.
        Parameters:
        mimeType - The mime type.
        secure - Whether the decoder is required to support secure decryption. Always pass false unless secure decryption really is required.
        Returns:
        The name of the best decoder and its capabilities for the given mimeType, or null if no decoder exists.
        Throws:
        MediaCodecUtil.DecoderQueryException

      • isSizeSupportedV21

        public static boolean isSizeSupportedV21(java.lang.String mimeType,
                                         boolean secure,
                                         int width,
                                         int height)
                                  throws MediaCodecUtil.DecoderQueryException
        Tests whether the device advertises it can decode video of a given type at a specified width and height.

        Must not be called if the device SDK version is less than 21.

        Parameters:
        mimeType - The mime type.
        secure - Whether the decoder is required to support secure decryption. Always pass false unless secure decryption really is required.
        width - Width in pixels.
        height - Height in pixels.
        Returns:
        Whether the decoder advertises support of the given size.
        Throws:
        MediaCodecUtil.DecoderQueryException

      • isSizeAndRateSupportedV21

        public static boolean isSizeAndRateSupportedV21(java.lang.String mimeType,
                                                boolean secure,
                                                int width,
                                                int height,
                                                double frameRate)
                                         throws MediaCodecUtil.DecoderQueryException
        Tests whether the device advertises it can decode video of a given type at a specified width, height, and frame rate.

        Must not be called if the device SDK version is less than 21.

        Parameters:
        mimeType - The mime type.
        secure - Whether the decoder is required to support secure decryption. Always pass false unless secure decryption really is required.
        width - Width in pixels.
        height - Height in pixels.
        frameRate - Frame rate in frames per second.
        Returns:
        Whether the decoder advertises support of the given size and frame rate.
        Throws:
        MediaCodecUtil.DecoderQueryException

      • isH264ProfileSupported

        public static boolean isH264ProfileSupported(int profile,
                                             int level)
                                      throws MediaCodecUtil.DecoderQueryException
        Parameters:
        profile - An AVC profile constant from MediaCodecInfo.CodecProfileLevel.
        level - An AVC profile level from MediaCodecInfo.CodecProfileLevel.
        Returns:
        Whether the specified profile is supported at the specified level.
        Throws:
        MediaCodecUtil.DecoderQueryException

      • maxH264DecodableFrameSize

        public static int maxH264DecodableFrameSize()
                                     throws MediaCodecUtil.DecoderQueryException
        Returns:
        the maximum frame size for an H264 stream that can be decoded on the device.
        Throws:
        MediaCodecUtil.DecoderQueryException
